duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain IAM solutions using modern programming languages and AWS services.
Administer Unix and Windows systems and utilize ticketing systems for issue resolution.
Provide 24/7 on-call support as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) for IAM systems.
Design secure, scalable computing systems and software architecture for cloud-based services.
Analyze and refine IAM principles and practices to ensure security, availability, and performance.
Demonstrate leadership in driving operational excellence and best practices in IAM engineering environments.
Deliver projects with a focus on security, availability, and performance of distributed software services.
Communicate effectively and coordinate with cross-functional teams for successful project delivery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
